hero.title: Join Our Team
hero.description: We're looking for talented individuals who are passionate about creating exceptional digital experiences. Join a team that values creativity, innovation, and growth.

benefits.title: Competitive Salary
benefits.description: We offer competitive compensation packages that reflect your skills and experience.

benefits.title: Flexible Work
benefits.description: Work from anywhere with flexible hours that fit your lifestyle.

benefits.title: Growth Opportunities
benefits.description: Continuous learning and career development with mentorship and training.

benefits.title: Great Culture
benefits.description: Collaborative environment with a supportive team and fun work atmosphere.

jobs.title: Senior Frontend Developer
jobs.description: We're looking for an experienced frontend developer to join our team. You'll work with React, Next.js, and modern web technologies to build high-performance websites.
requirements: Strong proficiency in React and Next.js

jobs.title: UI/UX Designer
jobs.description: Join our design team to create beautiful, user-centered interfaces. You'll work on diverse projects from concept to implementation.
requirements: Strong portfolio showcasing web design work
Proficiency in Figma or similar tools
Understanding of user research and testing

jobs.title: Full Stack Developer
jobs.description: We need a full stack developer who can work across the entire stack, from frontend to backend, to deliver complete solutions.

jobs.title: SEO Specialist
jobs.description: Help our clients achieve better search rankings. You'll work on SEO strategy, optimization, and analytics.
